resources.string: No time-sensitive tasks were found for today. \nRefresh or check Settings/Folder Paths if there are tasks to be found.
No tasks were found for today. \nRefresh or check Settings/Folder Paths if there are tasks to be found.

Add all the folders where you want to look for tasks. The search is recursive, meaning that it will look through all subfolders too. \nKeep in mind: The more general the path is, the longer it is going to take to update
